Conjuration 3

Summon Amphiptere
Ritual
A2N1
spell id [id]: 731

damage [damage]: 1412

Summon Units:#1412 Amphiptere
The caster summons an Amphiptere. The Amphiptere is a winged serpent almost the size of an elephant. It can fly and its breath is poisonous.
